metadata.Title: CVE-2020-22219 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description:
Buffer Overflow vulnerability in function bitwriter_grow_ in flac before1.4.0 allows remote attackers to run arbitrary code via crafted input tothe encoder.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-22219` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flac - 1.4.2+ds-2ubuntu1
libflac++10 - 1.4.2+ds-2ubuntu1
libflac12 - 1.4.2+ds-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flac package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.2+ds-2ubuntu1').
